items.strItemDescription: Humans! Happy Mogloween, 2012!
Happy Mogloween 2012!
It's over 5000! Happy Mogloween 2014!
The future is in the past! Forward! Happy Mogloween 2014!
Time to show what a real mystery tracker does! Happy Mogloween 2014!
I've been feelin' like a ghost and that's what I can't stand the most! This time I should just disappear! oh oh oh oh oh oh! Happy Mogloween 2014!
The snow glows white on these barren fields tonight, no footprints to be seen. A kingdom of loneliness, and I'm the queen. Let it be, let it be! Happy Mogloween 2014!
You are both a warrior and an assassin. You don't dance though. Happy Mogloween 2014!
No one calls you Vermin or Rodent and gets away with it! Happy Mogloween 2014!
I am Root! Happy Mogloween 2014!
Nothing goes over your head, your reflexes are too fast. You would catch it! Happy Mogloween 2014!
You've got a plan. Well, part of a plan. More like 10% of a plan but it's a plan! Happy Mogloween 2014!

Be the most handsomest Soulweaver in all of Lore! Fan-girl squeals not included. Happy Mogloween 2010!
Recommended for ages 10 and up. Rocket boots not included. Happy Mogloween 2010!
Who's that spy with the cool hair wing things? Trouble! Happy Mogloween 2010!
N'yah ngo'th sha'far Kathool f'tagn!! (Translation: "This mask smells like calamari!") Happy Mogloween 2010!
You're not quite sure what this is a mask of.... Happy Mogloween 2011!
Happy Mogloween 2012!
Happy Mogloween, 2012!
To gain this helm, something of equal value must be lost.
Wascally! Happy Mogloween 2011!
You can almost hear the icy winds of the north when you wear this Mogloween 2011 mask!
It would be REALLY hard to eat fava beans with this mask on!
RWAR! /shock
Not only do you look STRONG wearing this mask, but you look pretty BAD, too!
Hiya Kitty!
This is the mask. Yes, that mask.
You aren't a dummy when you're wearing this mask. It makes your defenses awesome!
Bon... Jovi! No... Ban... Zai! Wait... Hmm. BanKAI! That's it!
What lovely eyes you have, my dear!
*Squish* *Grumble* *Gurgle* Happy Mogloween 2011!
TTAAAARRRRRRRTT!!! Happy Mogloween 2010!
Be both cute AND adorable with just a single mask! Happy Mogloween 2010!
An early prototype for the Ferrous Dude super suit! Happy Mogloween 2010!
Hey! It's none of your Beez Mask! *snicker* Happy Mogloween 2010!
Get in touch with your inner greatness! Happy Mogloween 2011!
Gives you an irrational fear of cats, but also makes you an expert on exotic cheeses!
Dashing and daring is the name of the game when you wear this mask.
Hair wafting in the breeze, you're ready to smite weaklings and harness the power of the fire orb!
Guys... is my hair on fire? It feels like it's on fire...
It's hot to the touch... ouch!

The eerie glow coming from this mask lights the way to some serious mischief!
Burn baby, burn! The mad pyromancer's frightening visage is now yours!
A perfectly balanced helm that just happens to look a tad goofy. Smells a little fishy to me!
Despite the name, the mask is actually rather quiet. Could be useful for sneaking up on unsuspecting teenagers...
It's a little hard to see out of...
This mask really takes the cake.
Rule over the desert this fall! Happy Mogloween 2011!
Crikey! Looks just like the real Zard Hunter! Happy Mogloween 2010!
Look sassy with this classy mask! Happy Mogloween 2010!
RWAR!! With this mask, you'll surely have the scariest costume on the block! Happy Mogloween 2010!
You're not sure why, but this mask makes you feel like breaking the fourth wall! Hello, player! Happy Mogloween 2010! (No, Pop Culture is not a real resistance.)
Hello... again... Happy Mogloween 2011!
TAKE ALL THE CANDIES! Happy Mogloween 2011!
Gives you +10 to cute and cuddly too!
A classic Mogloween look. WARNING: Will dissolve in water! Keep away from all liquid!
This tribal mask will scare away evil voodoo spirits, and probably lots of other things too.
Hail to the king, baby. Uh-huh.
You suddenly have a strong urge to stack boxes...
Doubles as a sweet treat on a hot summer day!
Happy Mogloween, 2012!
Happy Mogloween, 2012!
The icy glare of Nivalis is caputured in this mask! Happy Mogloween 2011!
Be a creature from a dark lagoon... or at least look like one! Happy Mogloween 2010!
Behold the power of a dragonmage! WARNING: Dragonmage powers NOT included. Happy Mogloween 2010!
Chaos beckons! Happy Mogloween 2010!
Guaranteed to be Z-Virus free! Happy Mogloween 2010!
Become a SoulAlly! Happy Mogloween 2011!
Now you won't look out of place sitting on the walls of buildings!
THERE IS A SPIDER EATING YOUR FACE!
Does not come with rollbacks.
Alas, poor Skelly, I knew him!
Who's your mummy?

You'll love the voodoo you do!
Claw your way through any legion of enemies!
BRRAAAAIIINNNSSS!! Happy Mogloween 2010!
Everyone's favorite water elf, now in mask form! Happy Mogloween 2010!
Bah-gawk! Moo! Whichever! Happy Mogloween 2010!
Half-sneevil, half-zard, all ugly! Happy Mogloween 2010!
Get up early for candy! Happy Mogloween 2011!
A delicious reminder of Mogloween 2011!
Take a slice out of your opponents wearing this Mogloween 2011 mask.
It's the mask from the Black Lagoon!
Put this on and then go sit on someone's shoulder!
It is there. Do you see It? It's not scary, It's funny!
Do the Bunny Hop!
Bucket, bucket, who's got the bucket?
Your name isn't GOURD-on by any chance, is it?
Happy Mogloween 2012!
Woof! Happy Mogloween 2012!
The scariest mask of all. Maybe.
Don't hold a grudge!
The origins of this mask are mysterious.
There's some writing on the inside of this mask but it doesn't say anything you can understand.
Wearing this mask fills you with a sense of pride and accomplishment.
Unravel the unwanted candy at the bottom of the bag.
A different perspective can change almost anything.
Sweet dreams.
This mask smells... delicious.
More hands = more candy!
Trick of Brie!
Extraplanar tricks!
A'thu kra pthagna.
Move from house to house like the wind.
How do you even keep this on your head?!
A vision.
Wearing this mask in the land of Lhe'Shyiac would probably not be a good idea.
This mask probably isn't in the best of taste. Watch out, lest you bring down the ire of both The Rose and elves alike.
This mask is quite different than the others...
The mask of a face of legend... or the future?
What a smug mask. Click to change expressions!
Such a huggable mask! Click to change expressions!
This mask is no joke.
A mask of vengeance and inner balance.
A mask of corrupted beauty. Click to change expressions!
A mask of corrupted rest. Click to change expressions!
A mask of corrupted pride.
A mask of practical action.
A mask of tempered calculation.
A mask of corrupted arrogance.
This mask is very cute and definitely not evil.
This mask looks very familiar.
This mask looks like it was created for some purpose other than Mogloween... Smells like spiders.
When you wear this mask, you go fast, live, learn, and feel like the world is yours, or it might be, tomorrow.
This mask makes you want to do a suspiciously good job.
Despite this mask's cute appearance, everyone seems to be terrified of it.
